author: cmlenz
msg: Make the timing of the ContainerRunner configurable, and use short times for the test (still takes too long)

author: cmlenz
msg: Make the 'timeout' property global to the <containers> element.
Having a separate timeout per container is probably overkill.

author: cmlenz
msg: Add some basic tests that verify whether the ContainerRunner (functionality formerly found in <runservertests>) is working correctly.
The tests currently take a long time (20secs here) because of the excessive sleeping the ContainerRunner does. I'll need to figure out a nice way to tune the sleep times for the tests.

author: cmlenz
msg: Package reorg: Move container core classes into the o.a.c.i.a.container package
(Caution: part of a big commit, split into multiple commits so the commit message doesn't become too big to send to the list)
